search_results.title: Kathy Khang: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Kathy Khang is a writer, speaker, and yoga teacher. She is the author of Raise Your Voice: Why We Stay Silent & How to Speak Up (IV Press, 2018)

search_results.title: Kathy Khang
search_results.snippet: Kathy Khang, a columnist for Sojourners magazine, is the author of Raise Your Voice (InterVarsity Press, 2018) and co-author of More Than Serving Tea.
